title: pelimies
author: pelimies
content: Hey Crypto Enthusiasts! Are you tired of jumping through KYC hoops just to trade your favorite cryptocurrencies? Well, guess what? The game is about to change, and it's changing with BitX! Introducing BitX - the FIRST-EVER crypto exchange that lets you trade without the hassle of KYC!  Say goodbye to intrusive identity verifications and hello to financial freedom! Secure & Anonymous Trading: BitX is built on advanced technology, providing a safe and anonymous trading platform. Your privacy is our priority! No More Limits: Sick of having your trading limits tied to KYC verification? BitX breaks those chains, giving you the freedom to trade without restrictions. Global Access: BitX opens its doors to crypto enthusiasts worldwide. No matter where you are, you can join the revolution and trade on our platform! Community-Driven: BitX isn't just an exchange; it's a movement. Join our vibrant community of like-minded traders and be part of something bigger! Ready to experience the future of crypto trading? Dive into BitX today and trade with the freedom you deserve! https://www.pinksale.finance/launchpad/0x53a3Af4857baEfcE0fAD68B826676A2bcF4017b8?chain=BSCALL SOCIALS ; https://linktr.ee/bitxglobalVisit BitX Now!#BitXRevolution #CryptoFreedom #NoMoreKYC

comments.author: Beparanf
comments.body: Exchange website looks crappy while there's no actual product to offer even though you are already asking money for investment to your exchange. I doubt too that you can stick to No KYC feature forever with the existence of regulators around. You should add the main website on your thread by embedding the URL on the picture attached or embed it on the text for the exchange name. But I doubt someone will be interested here to invest on exchange that launch presale on pinksale.

comments.author: Xal0lex
comments.body: Why link to Pancake if there is no way to buy your token there because there is no liquidity there to make the purchase? There are no dates in the roadmap, it is not clear when what is written there will be realized. And yes, as written above, specify the address in your post. It's inconvenient to type it in manually.

comments.author: Blowon
comments.body: I see from your roadmap that you are very focused on registering $bitx tokens for trading on CEX Target which is quite impressive but I am a little doubtful about the current resultssales and I see your social media is nothing interesting

comments.author: GlacierBIT
comments.body: Quote from: Beparanf on November 17, 2023, 02:46:35 PMExchange website looks crappy while there's no actual product to offer even though you are already asking money for investment to your exchange. I doubt too that you can stick to No KYC feature forever with the existence of regulators around. You should add the main website on your thread by embedding the URL on the picture attached or embed it on the text for the exchange name. But I doubt someone will be interested here to invest on exchange that launch presale on pinksale.  I agree with you, this freedom  "no kyc" will not last so long. This is a kind of marketing for a startup. Let's see how the project proves itself, maybe it will grow in quality and become popular.
